metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31613 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer, where any local user can cause a null-pointerdereference, which may lead to a kernel panic.
